Html:
Hi once again!

I was fiddling around a bit with threat stuffs, and just realized that the nice prioritized list of abilities in the rawr window does not list Maul at any given time.

How does maul fit into this? Purely as rage dump?

It also says "2. Demoralizing Rawr is not up" I take it thats supposed to be an "if" instead of an "is"?

Anyway, thanks for the awesome work on the new rawr, I really like it, its a life saver (always has been)!

Yes, it's assumed that you're Maulling on cooldown, whenever you have the rage (should be always, when raid tanking).

Yes, 'is' should be 'if'.
